subsection.name: Using the version CLI option
subsection.p: We can override the default SNAPSHOT version identifier using the -version command-line option. In the following example we are requesting a listing of the in-scope projects together with the version cli option using the value ABC.
subsection.pre:
$ build -list -version ABC
Selection: [3]
[1] project:org/acme/plugin/clock-api#ABC [2] project:org/acme/plugin/clock-impl#ABC [3] module:org/acme/plugin#ABC
$
